projects.title: Ruby and MiniTest
projects.description: Learning Ruby while becoming a more test-driven developer. TDD rules!

projects.title: College Madness
projects.description: Gamified college research project for students that is tied to the NCAA Basketball Tournament. Built using React JS on the front end and a Ruby on Rails back end API.

projects.title: Pop-Music-Pop-Quiz
projects.description: Built using Angular JS on the front end, a Ruby on Rails back end, adn the Spotify API.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: Built using jQuery and the Handlebars javascript template tool. Fun memory game that reveals matches or fails.

projects.title: Music Streamer
projects.description: Angular JS app built to simulate a streaming music database with user login, local storage, and dynamically dispalyed information.

projects.title: NC Breweries
projects.description: Interactive web app that allows a user to search for a brewery and its associated beers. Beers have a name, kind (stout, pilsner..etc.), description, and rating. Another great use of jQuery, handlebars, and a RESTful API!

projects.title: Medium-Crossover
projects.description: Site built to resemble popular micro-blogging site Medium.com. jQuery used to create user interactions as well as hangling AJAX calls to our rails-based back end.
